descp2: string, 'train', 'test', or 'all', default='all' Select the dataset to load: 'train' for the training set (23149 samples), 'test' for the test set (781265 samples), 'all' for both, with the training samples first if shuffle is False. This follows the official LYRL2004 chronological split.
